00022 #ifndef GFAL_UNIT_TESTSUITE_H
00023 #define GFAL_UNIT_TESTSUITE_H
00024 
00025 #include <stdio.h>
00026 #include <stdlib.h>
00027 
00030 #define GFAL_TEST_ASSERT(condition) \
00031     do { \
00032         printf("\t Test at %s:%d... ", __FILE__, __LINE__); \
00033         if (!(condition)) { \
00034             printf("FAILED\n"); \
00035             exit(-1); \
00036         } \
00037         printf("OK\n"); \
00038     } while (0)
00039 
00043 #define GFAL_TEST_EQUAL(expected, value) \
00044     do { \
00045         printf("\t Test at %s:%d... ", __FILE__, __LINE__); \
00046         if ((expected) != (value)) { \
00047             printf("FAILED. Expected: %d, Got: %d\n", (expected), (value)); \
00048             exit(-1); \
00049         } \
00050         printf("OK\n"); \
00051     } while (0)
00052 
00056 #define GFAL_TEST_EQUAL_STRING(expected, value) \
00057     do { \
00058         printf("\t Test at %s:%d... ", __FILE__, __LINE__); \
00059         if (strcmp(expected, value) != 0) { \
00060             printf("FAILED. Expected: \"%s\", Got: \"%s\"\n", (expected), (value)); \
00061             exit(-1); \
00062         } \
00063         printf("OK\n"); \
00064     } while (0)
00065 
00066 #define GFAL_TEST_RUN(test) \
00067     do { \
00068         printf("\nRunning: %s...\n", #test); \
00069         test(); \
00070         __gfal_tests_run++; \
00071        } while (0)
00072 
00074 extern int __gfal_tests_run;
00075 
00076 #endif /* #ifndef GFAL_UNIT_TESTSUITE_H */
